name: Punch Party
description:
A humorous response to VR game development. Avoid punching your friends while frantically collecting virtual orbs.

What's going on?

Vive player marks where three friends are standing within the playspace. Random objects spawn near those locations. Vive player must grab objects and throw them into a bin. If more than 15 objects are in the scene, the player loses. Non-Vive players are allowed to dodge, but cannot move their feet.

*Requires a Vive*
